author: Elastic
attributes.description: A supervised machine learning model has identified a DNS question name that used by the SUNBURST malware and is predicted to be the result of a Domain Generation Algorithm."
attributes.name: Machine Learning Detected DGA activity using a known SUNBURST DNS domain
attributes.query: event.category:network and network.protocol:dns and ml_is_dga.malicious_prediction:1 and dns.question.registered_domain:avsvmcloud.com
